import React, {Component} from 'react' import dice from './GameDieBigpng.png' import playerList from './PlayerListBackground.png' import gamelogo from './Upward_Mobility_big.png' import { moveDist } from "./Game"; const eventsArray = [ { id: 1, description: "A mysterious raggedy wizard appears before you and asks the question... 'What is the airspeed velocity of an unladen swallow?'", options: [ "What do you mean? African or European swallow?", "I don't know that!", "What is an unladen swallow?" ], results: [ "The wizard is dumbfounded and spontaneously combusts into 2 coins which are added to your wallet! The wizard slaps you and you move back 3 spaces", "The wizard slaps you and you move back 3 spaces" ] }, { id: 2, description: "You stumble upon a treasure chest buried in the ground.", options: [ "Open the chest", "Leave the chest alone" ], results: [ "You find a rare item and add it to your inventory!", "The chest is booby-trapped and you lose 3 coins" ] }, // Add more events here... ]; console.log("Events array: " + eventsArray[1].options[0]) export function UpwardMobilityBoard ({ctx, G, moves, events}, eventsArray){ console.log("This is the current phase: " + ctx.phase) const { moveDist } = G; let eventScreenContents = ""; // if (G.players[ctx.currentPlayer].position === 25) { ctx.phase = "winningGameScreen"; } switch (ctx.phase) { case "rollScreen": eventScreenContents = (
moves.rollDice()} className="DiceImage" id="NoPath_-_Copy_8" src="NoPath_-_Copy_8.png" srcSet="NoPath_-_Copy_8.png 1x, NoPath_-_Copy_8@2x.png 2x"/>
A pair of strange dice lay before you...
) break; case "eventOrItemScreen": eventScreenContents = (
Player {ctx.currentPlayer + 1} moves {moveDist} landing on cell {G.players[ctx.currentPlayer].position}
) break; case "eventScreen": eventScreenContents = (
A mysterious raggedy wizard appears before you and asks the question... "What is the airspeed velocity of an unladen swallow?"
) break; case "useItemScreen": eventScreenContents = (
use item screen
) break; case "correctAnswerScreen": eventScreenContents = (
The wizard is dumbfound and spontaneously combusts into 2 coins which are added to your wallet!
) break; case "pickUpItemScreen": eventScreenContents = (
You have picked up the wizards staff which is added to your inventory.
) break; case "wrongAnswerScreen": eventScreenContents = (
The wizard slaps you and you move back 3 spaces
) break; case "winningGameScreen": eventScreenContents = (
Player {ctx.currentPlayer} has won the game.
) case "endTurnScreen": eventScreenContents = (
Your turn is over!
) break; } return(
{/**/} {eventScreenContents} {/*{console.log("This is current phase : " + ctx.phase)}*/} {/* moves.tempRoll()} className="DiceImage" id="NoPath_-_Copy_8" src="NoPath_-_Copy_8.png" srcSet="NoPath_-_Copy_8.png 1x, NoPath_-_Copy_8@2x.png 2x"/>*/} {/*
*/} {/* A pair of strange dice lay before you...*/} {/*
*/} {/**/} {/**/} {/*/!**!/*/}
{/*Player List*/} {/*Player List*/} {/*Inventory List*/}
Inventory
{/*Inventory List*/} {/*Chat List*/}
Type here to chat...
{/*Chat List*/} {/*Player Stat List*/}
TempName
TempJobTitle
$12345
+$2000 in 2 turns
{/*Player Stat List*/}
) }
